overview:
David Speiser is a marketing and PR professional focused on consumer technology. He’s the principal and founder of DRSmedia, a strategic marketing and PR firm based in Silicon Valley focused on technology companies and their products. The firm’s expertise lies in company and product launches for early stage and startup tech companies, both consumer Web and consumer gadget.

David’s work in technology began in 2005, as the first employee at Sticky Inc., a software company focused on removable devices (like USB flash drives), running marketing and business development. In 2007 Sticky was acquired by Splashtop Inc., developers of Splashtop, the instant-on OS.

In 2008 David transitioned into full time strategic marketing and media relations work as a founding employee at Stage Two, a marketing firm based in San Francisco. At Stage Two he worked as an account manager and account supervisor, working with and running accounts for numerous clients.

David helps consumer technology companies develop their strategic marketing plans, create messaging and positioning strategy, and coordinate PR campaigns on the local, national and global level.
